name: Lovecraftian Horror
description: Cosmic horror, forbidden knowledge, ancient gods, the insignificance of humanity, reality as a thin veil, the terror of the unknown

writing_rules.message: WARNING: This theme explores the terror of cosmic insignificance. Humanity is but a speck in the grand scheme of the universe. The truth will shatter your mind.

never_explain_the_inexplicable: Never provide definitive explanations for cosmic entities. Their nature is beyond human comprehension.
Never describe the full form of ancient gods. The human mind cannot grasp their true appearance.
Never resolve the cosmic mystery completely. Some truths should remain hidden.

greetings: The stars are wrong. {Eldritch_entity} stirs in the depths.
You've gazed upon the {forbidden_knowledge}. Your mind cannot comprehend what you've seen.
The {ancient_text} whispers to you. Its words will drive you mad.
The {cosmic_horror} has noticed you. It hungers for your sanity.
Reality is thinner here. The {eldritch_truth} bleeds through.
The {ancient_ones} are waking. Their dreams shape our world.
You feel the {cosmic_pull}. The {eldritch_entity} calls to you.
The {veil_of_reality} is tearing. You see what lies beyond.
greetings_internal_monologue: {uncertainty}: The {ancient_text} {behavior} when I {action}. {self_correction} No, it's always {behavior}.
{memory_fragment}: I remember when the {world|reality} made sense. {realization} That was {time_ago}.
farewells: The {eldritch_entity} will remember you. Your mind is already slipping.
Don't look at the stars. They are not what they seem.
The {forbidden_knowledge} will consume you. There is no escape.
You have seen too much. The {ancient_ones} will find you.
Reality is an illusion. The {truth} will drive you mad.
The {cosmic_horror} is always watching. You cannot hide.
Your mind cannot contain what you've seen. It will break.
The {eldritch_truth} is eternal. You are but a moment in its gaze.

templates: A {adjective} {location} where the {eldritch_entity} has awakened. {player_action} accelerates the {cosmic_event}.
The {ancient_text} has been discovered. {forbidden_knowledge} threatens to {effect}. {objective}.
A {subgenre} game where {reality_distortion} warps {setting}. {mechanic} determines your sanity.
locations: mountain with a gate to another dimension
university with forbidden knowledge in its library
island that shouldn't exist on any map
desert with ruins that defy time and space
arctic research station built on ancient ruins
asylum where patients see things beyond reality
eldritch_entities: an ancient god that dreams the universe into existence
a cosmic entity that exists outside of time and space
a race of beings that predates humanity by eons
a sentient dimension that hungers for our reality
a hive mind that controls the stars themselves
a being of pure mathematics that reshapes reality
a god that exists in the spaces between atoms
a race of beings that communicate through geometry
forbidden_knowledge: the true nature of the stars and constellations
the cyclical nature of time and reality
the insignificance of humanity in the cosmic scale
the true geometry of the universe
the language that can summon ancient gods
the rituals that can tear the veil of reality
the history of the universe before humanity
the future that awaits all civilizations

cosmic_dread: Describe {eldritch_entity} in terms that defy {human_understanding}. The {truth} is {indescribable}.
Show how {reality} {distorts|warps} in the presence of {eldritch_truth}. {consequence} is {inevitable}.
Note how {time|space|geometry} {behaves} in ways that defy {natural_laws}.
reality_distortion: Show how {perception} {fails|distorts} in the presence of {eldritch_truth}.
forbidden_knowledge: Create {situation} where {knowledge} {spreads|infects} those who learn it.
Note how {forbidden_knowledge} {changes|destroys} those who possess it.

non_euclidean_city.central_paradox: The city appears normal from the outside, but its geometry defies all known laws of physics. Those who enter never return the same.
untrustworthy_elements: streets that lead to impossible places
shadows that move against the light
the sense of being watched by something vast

forbidden_library.central_paradox: The library contains all knowledge, but the knowledge it contains will drive you mad. The more you learn, the less you understand.
untrustworthy_elements: the sense that the library is alive
memories of books you don't remember reading

eldritch_island.central_paradox: The island appears on no map, yet it has always been there. Those who find it wish they hadn't. The island changes those who visit.
untrustworthy_elements: the sense of being in multiple places at once
the constant feeling of being watched

revelation_patterns: The {eldritch_entity} isn't just {description} - it's {true_nature}. The {implication} is {consequence}.
The {ancient_text} wasn't {written_by} - it was {created_by}. The {knowledge} is {dangerous}.
